Translations.Text: Ga fu. Yi zunyan de “gulanjing” mengshi
Nandao tamen yin tongzu de jinggao zhe lailin tamen er jingya ma? Bu xindao de renmen shuo:“Zhe shi qi shi
Nandao women ji si zhihou, yi bian cheng chentu, hai yao huanyuan ma? Na tai bu jin qinglile.”
Wo que yi zhidao dadi duiyu tamen de boshi, wo zhe li youyi ben bei baohu de tian jing
Tamen fouren yi jiang shi tamen de zhenli, suoyi tamen xianyu hunluan de zhuangtai zhong
Nandao tamen meiyou yangshi tianti ma? Wo shi zenyang jianzao ta, dianzhui ta, shi ta meiyou quexian de
Wo ceng zhankai dadi, bing jiang xuduo shanyue tou zai shangmian, hai shi ge zhong meili de zhiwu shengzhang chulai
wei de shi qifa he jiaohui mei ge guiyi de puren
Wo cong tianshang jiangxia jixiang de yushui, jiu jie ta er shengzhang chu xuduo guoshu he wugu
bing shengzhang fushu di hai zao shu, ta you leilei de guoshi
yong zuo zhong pu de jiyang. Wo jie yushui er shi yi si di difang fuhuo. Siren de fuhuo yeshi zheyang de
Zai tamen zhiqian fouren shizhe de ren, you nu ha de zongzu, lan si de jumin, sai mo de ren
a de ren, falao, lu te de tongbao
conglin de jumin he tu bai de baixing, tongtong dou fourenguo shizhe, guwo suo jinggao de xingfa, shi biran jianglin de
Wo ceng yin chuangzao er pijuan ma? Buran, tamen duiyu zaizao, shi zai yihuo zhong de
